parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions the PNL (Partidul Național Liberal) party and advocates for voting for them.  This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not a private communication but aims for broader dissemination, fulfilling the requirement of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to choose the PNL.  Phrases like "Votul pentru PNL este votul pentru o Rom\u00e2nie modern\u0103" (Voting for PNL is voting for a modern Romania) and "Vota\u021bi PNL pentru o Rom\u00e2nie puternic\u0103 \u00een Europa" (Vote PNL for a strong Romania in Europe) clearly demonstrate an intention to influence the electoral outcome, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents some political arguments, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It's primarily promotional material for the PNL, not an unbiased news piece.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; it's a clear political advertisement promoting a specific party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1556211045019020</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes the PNL party, urging voters to support them in the parliamentary elections.  The post uses persuasive language, highlighting the party's policies and contrasting them with alternatives.  The paid nature of the post, its broad reach, and its explicit call to vote for a specific party strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda. The post fulfills all criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. The image shows a person voting, which further reinforces the electoral context.  While the post's end date is after the election, the fact that it was published and promoted during the election period makes it electoral propaganda.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Dumitru Rujan, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea și promovarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID 1556211045019020) cu conținut electoral care promovează Partidul Național Liberal (PNL), îndemnând la vot pentru acest partid. Postarea, plătită și cu o audiență largă, îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea PNL. Fraze precum „Votul pentru PNL este votul pentru o Românie modernă” și „Votați PNL pentru o Românie puternică în Europa” demonstrează clar intenția de a influența rezultatul alegerilor.  Imaginea atașată postării, care înfățișează o persoană votând, întărește și mai mult contextul electoral.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
